spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.description: Creates undead skeletons and zombies.

spells.name: Bestow Curse
spells.description: –6 to an ability score; –4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

spells.name: Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: Makes subject blinded or deafened.

spells.name: Contagion
spells.description: Infects subject with chosen disease.

spells.name: Continual Flame
spells.description: Makes a permanent, heatless light.

spells.name: Create Food and Water
spells.description: Feeds three humans (or one horse)/level.

spells.name: Cure Serious Wounds
spells.description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

spells.name: Daylight
spells.description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

spells.name: Deeper Darkness
spells.description: Object sheds supernatural shadow in 60-ft. radius.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

spells.name: Glyph of Warding
spells.description: Inscription harms those who pass it.

spells.name: Helping Hand
spells.description: Ghostly hand leads subject to you.

spells.name: Inflict Serious Wounds
spells.description: Touch attack, 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

spells.name: Invisibility Purge
spells.description: Dispels invisibility within 5 ft./level.

spells.name: Locate Object
spells.description: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

spells.name: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spells.description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

spells.name: Magic Vestment
spells.description: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.

spells.name: Meld into Stone
spells.description: You and your gear merge with stone.

spells.name: Obscure Object
spells.description: Masks object against scrying.

spells.name: Prayer
spells.description: Allies get +1 bonus on most rolls, enemies –1 penalty.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.description: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

spells.name: Remove Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: Cures normal or magical blindness or deafness.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.description: Frees object or person from curse.

spells.name: Remove Disease
spells.description: Cures all diseases affecting subject.

spells.name: Searing Light
spells.description: Ray deals 1d8/two levels damage (more against undead).

spells.name: Speak with Dead
spells.description: Corpse answers one question/two levels.

spells.name: Stone Shape
spells.description: Sculpts stone into any shape.

spells.name: Summon Monster III
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Water Breathing
spells.description: Subjects can breathe underwater.

spells.name: Water Walk
spells.description: Subject treads on water as if solid.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.
